entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
